info.author: stevenda stevenda@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract: Given a transaction file, generate labels for gaming based on Paquette et al, 2014 detector
info.description: Given a transaction file, generate labels for gaming based on Paquette 2014 detector
info.options: transaction_id -- column designating the unique transaction identifier student_id -- column designating a unique ID per student session_id -- column with the ID for each student work session outcome_column -- column containing the label of the outcome for each transaction duration_column -- column containing the time duration of each transaction input_column -- column containing the actual value of the student input associated with this transaction problem_column -- column with the label for the unique problem identifier step_column -- columns with the unique label for the problem sub-step identifier correct_labels -- Values of outcome column corresponding to a correct input incorrect_labels -- Values of outcome column corresponding to an incorrect input hint_labels -- Values of outcome column corresponding to a transaction that was a help request bug_labels -- Values of outcome column corresponding to a transaction with an input that was identified as reflecting a well known misconception or mistake
